name: Seth Godin
what_you_do: Seth Godin is a prolific marketing author, blogger, and speaker who teaches entrepreneurs and marketers about permission marketing, tribes, and the future of work.
who_you_serve: Seth Godin serves individuals and organizations interested in professional development, sustainability, and leadership in addressing climate change. His audience includes business professionals, educators, and anyone seeking to understand and act on climate issues.
signature_programs: 34 Things to Know about Carbon and Climate
current_projects: 34 Things to Know about Carbon and Climate online class
social_proof: 21 bestsellers, founding editor of the Carbon Almanac, 5,212 users liked the course, 4.7 out of 5 rating from 2,221 ratings.
bio: 21 bestsellers, founding editor of the Carbon Almanac, 5,212 users liked the course, 4.7 out of 5 rating from 2,221 ratings.
